Text: Our visit last week Cc Good morning I wanted to thank each of you personally for taking the time to meet with Bob and I last week It was great getting to know you and to see how youre going to use ePlanning to help proactively manage your business Clearly youre going to push the envelope in ways we havent seen clients go before a tribute to the innovativeness of Enron and its people Its great to think that our software is going to really make a difference in how youre employing information and involving people in your planning processes going forward Thanks for all your support and I look forward to a strong and lasting partnership with you and your teams Dont hesitate to ever call if theres anything I can do for you As a little aside I sent along a great slide show chronicling your floods a few weeks back I am sure youve seen these already but if not the pictures are pretty awesome MarkJan I will be working up a proposal on the PR front after the Fourth holiday week has passed I will be curious to hear ifhow your preliminary discussions with the PR team progressed I think we can do some great things that will further Enrons most innovative image using business planning as a platform More to come And yes Mark we will get our racquets warmed up during our next visit I must say however your recent match with a Wimbledon Master has me just a bit daunted right now I guess thats a good psychological advantage for you Take care Jeff Director Global Customer Relations Adaytum office mobile TSAllisonHoustondevastationpps TSAllisonHoustondevastationpps
